text.ascii: mArkaNDeya uvAca
text.ur: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca

text.ascii: yadAbhiSikto bhagavAn senApatyena pAvakiH
text.ur: yadābhiṣikto bhagavān senāpatyena pāvakiḥ

text.ascii: tadA saMprasthitaH zrImAn hRSTo bhadravaTaM haraH
text.ur: tadā saṁprasthitaḥ śrīmān hr̥ṣṭo bhadravaṭaṁ haraḥ

text.ascii: rathenAdityavarNena pArvatyA sahitaH prabhuH
text.ur: rathenādityavarṇena pārvatyā sahitaḥ prabhuḥ

text.ascii: sahasraM tasya siMhAnAM tasmin yuktaM rathottame
text.ur: sahasraṁ tasya siṁhānāṁ tasmin yuktaṁ rathottame

text.ascii: utpapAta divaM zubhraM kAlenAbhipracoditaH
text.ur: utpapāta divaṁ śubhraṁ kālenābhipracoditaḥ

text.ascii: te pibanta ivAkAzaM trAsayantaz carAcarAn
text.ur: te pibanta ivākāśaṁ trāsayantaś carācarān

text.ascii: siMhA nabhasy agacchanta nadantaz cArukesarAH
text.ur: siṁhā nabhasy agacchanta nadantaś cārukesarāḥ

text.ascii: tasmin rathe pazupatiH sthito bhAty umayA saha
text.ur: tasmin rathe paśupatiḥ sthito bhāty umayā saha

text.ascii: vidyutA sahitaH sUryaH sendracApe ghane yathA
text.ud: विद्युता सहितः सूर्यः सेन्द्रचापे घने यथा
text.ur: vidyutā sahitaḥ sūryaḥ sendracāpe ghane yathā

text.ascii: agratas tasya bhagavAn dhanezo guhyakaiH saha
text.ur: agratas tasya bhagavān dhaneśo guhyakaiḥ saha

text.ascii: AsthAya ruciraM yAti puSpakaM naravAhanaH
text.ur: āsthāya ruciraṁ yāti puṣpakaṁ naravāhanaḥ

text.ascii: airAvataM samAsthAya zakraz cApi suraiH saha
text.ur: airāvataṁ samāsthāya śakraś cāpi suraiḥ saha

text.ascii: pRSThato 'nuyayau yAntaM varadaM vRSabhadhvajam
text.ur: pr̥ṣṭhato ’nuyayau yāntaṁ varadaṁ vr̥ṣabhadhvajam

text.ascii: jambhakair yakSarakSobhiH sragvibhiH samalaMkRtaH
text.ur: jambhakair yakṣarakṣobhiḥ sragvibhiḥ samalaṁkr̥taḥ

text.ascii: yAty amogho mahAyakSo dakSiNaM pakSam AsthitaH
text.ur: yāty amogho mahāyakṣo dakṣiṇaṁ pakṣam āsthitaḥ

text.ascii: tasya dakSiNato devA marutaz citrayodhinaH
text.ur: tasya dakṣiṇato devā marutaś citrayodhinaḥ

text.ascii: gacchanti vasubhiH sArdhaM rudraiz ca saha saMgatAH
text.ud: गच्छन्ति वसुभिः सार्धं रुद्रैश्च सह संगताः
text.ur: gacchanti vasubhiḥ sārdhaṁ rudraiś ca saha saṁgatāḥ

text.ascii: yamaz ca mRtyunA sArdhaM sarvataH parivAritaH
text.ur: yamaś ca mr̥tyunā sārdhaṁ sarvataḥ parivāritaḥ

text.ascii: ghorair vyAdhizatair yAti ghorarUpavapus tathA
text.ur: ghorair vyādhiśatair yāti ghorarūpavapus tathā

text.ascii: yamasya pRSThataz caiva ghoras trizikharaH zitaH
text.ur: yamasya pr̥ṣṭhataś caiva ghoras triśikharaḥ śitaḥ

text.ascii: vijayo nAma rudrasya yAti zUlaH svalaMkRtaH
text.ud: विजयो नाम रुद्रस्य याति शूलः स्वलंकृतः
text.ur: vijayo nāma rudrasya yāti śūlaḥ svalaṁkr̥taḥ

text.ascii: tam ugrapAzo varuNo bhagavAn salilezvaraH
text.ur: tam ugrapāśo varuṇo bhagavān salileśvaraḥ

text.ascii: parivArya zanair yAti yAdobhir vividhair vRtaH
text.ur: parivārya śanair yāti yādobhir vividhair vr̥taḥ

text.ascii: pRSThato vijayasyApi yAti rudrasya paTTizaH
text.ur: pr̥ṣṭhato vijayasyāpi yāti rudrasya paṭṭiśaḥ

text.ascii: gadAmusalazaktyAdyair vRtaH praharaNottamaiH
text.ur: gadāmusalaśaktyādyair vr̥taḥ praharaṇottamaiḥ

text.ascii: paTTizaM tv anvagAd rAjaMz chatraM raudraM mahAprabham
text.ur: paṭṭiśaṁ tv anvagād rājaṁś chatraṁ raudraṁ mahāprabham

text.ascii: kamaNDaluz cApy anu taM maharSigaNasaMvRtaH
text.ur: kamaṇḍaluś cāpy anu taṁ maharṣigaṇasaṁvr̥taḥ

text.ascii: tasya dakSiNato bhAti daNDo gacchaJ zriyA vRtaH
text.ud: तस्य दक्षिणतो भाति दण्डो गच्छञ्श्रिया वृतः
text.ur: tasya dakṣiṇato bhāti daṇḍo gacchañ śriyā vr̥taḥ

text.ascii: bhRgvaGgirobhiH sahito devaiz cApy abhipUjitaH
text.ur: bhr̥gvaṅgirobhiḥ sahito devaiś cāpy abhipūjitaḥ

text.ascii: eSAM tu pRSThato rudro vimale syandane sthitaH
text.ud: एषां तु पृष्ठतो रुद्रो विमले स्यन्दने स्थितः
text.ur: eṣāṁ tu pr̥ṣṭhato rudro vimale syandane sthitaḥ

text.ascii: yAti saMharSayan sarvAMs tejasA tridivaukasaH
text.ur: yāti saṁharṣayan sarvāṁs tejasā tridivaukasaḥ

text.ascii: RSayaz caiva devAz ca gandharvA bhujagAs tathA
text.ur: r̥ṣayaś caiva devāś ca gandharvā bhujagās tathā

text.ascii: nadyo nadA drumAz caiva tathaivApsarasAM gaNAH
text.ur: nadyo nadā drumāś caiva tathaivāpsarasāṁ gaṇāḥ

text.ascii: nakSatrANi grahAz caiva devAnAM zizavaz ca ye
text.ur: nakṣatrāṇi grahāś caiva devānāṁ śiśavaś ca ye

text.ascii: striyaz ca vividhAkArA yAnti rudrasya pRSThataH
text.ur: striyaś ca vividhākārā yānti rudrasya pr̥ṣṭhataḥ

text.ascii: sRjantyaH puSpavarSANi cArurUpA varAGganAH
text.ur: sr̥jantyaḥ puṣpavarṣāṇi cārurūpā varāṅganāḥ

text.ascii: parjanyaz cApy anuyayau namaskRtya pinAkinam
text.ur: parjanyaś cāpy anuyayau namaskr̥tya pinākinam

text.ascii: chatraM tu pANDuraM somas tasya mUrdhany adhArayat
text.ur: chatraṁ tu pāṇḍuraṁ somas tasya mūrdhany adhārayat

text.ascii: cAmare cApi vAyuz ca gRhItvAgniz ca viSThitau
text.ur: cāmare cāpi vāyuś ca gr̥hītvāgniś ca viṣṭhitau

text.ascii: zakraz ca pRSThatas tasya yAti rAjaJ zriyA vRtaH
text.ur: śakraś ca pr̥ṣṭhatas tasya yāti rājañ śriyā vr̥taḥ

text.ascii: saha rAjarSibhiH sarvaiH stuvAno vRSaketanam
text.ur: saha rājarṣibhiḥ sarvaiḥ stuvāno vr̥ṣaketanam

text.ascii: gaurI vidyAtha gAndhArI kezinI mitrasAhvayA
text.ur: gaurī vidyātha gāndhārī keśinī mitrasāhvayā

text.ascii: sAvitryA saha sarvAs tAH pArvatyA yAnti pRSThataH
text.ud: सावित्र्या सह सर्वास्ताः पार्वत्या यान्ति पृष्ठतः
text.ur: sāvitryā saha sarvās tāḥ pārvatyā yānti pr̥ṣṭhataḥ

text.ascii: tatra vidyAgaNAH sarve ye ke cit kavibhiH kRtAH
text.ud: तत्र विद्यागणाः सर्वे ये केचित्कविभिः कृताः
text.ur: tatra vidyāgaṇāḥ sarve ye ke cit kavibhiḥ kr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: yasya kurvanti vacanaM sendrA devAz camUmukhe
text.ur: yasya kurvanti vacanaṁ sendrā devāś camūmukhe

text.ascii: sa gRhItvA patAkAM tu yAty agre rAkSaso grahaH
text.ud: स गृहीत्वा पताकां तु यात्यग्रे राक्षसो ग्रहः
text.ur: sa gr̥hītvā patākāṁ tu yāty agre rākṣaso grahaḥ

text.ascii: vyApRtas tu zmazAne yo nityaM rudrasya vai sakhA
text.ud: व्यापृतस्तु श्मशाने यो नित्यं रुद्रस्य वै सखा
text.ur: vyāpr̥tas tu śmaśāne yo nityaṁ rudrasya vai sakhā

text.ascii: piGgalo nAma yakSendro lokasyAnandadAyakaH
text.ur: piṅgalo nāma yakṣendro lokasyānandadāyakaḥ

text.ascii: ebhiH sa sahitas tatra yayau devo yathAsukham
text.ud: एभिः स सहितस्तत्र ययौ देवो यथासुखम्
text.ur: ebhiḥ sa sahitas tatra yayau devo yathāsukham

text.ascii: agrataH pRSThataz caiva na hi tasya gatir dhruvA
text.ud: अग्रतः पृष्ठतश्चैव न हि तस्य गतिर्ध्रुवा
text.ur: agrataḥ pr̥ṣṭhataś caiva na hi tasya gatir dhruvā

text.ascii: rudraM satkarmabhir martyAH pUjayantIha daivatam
text.ur: rudraṁ satkarmabhir martyāḥ pūjayantīha daivatam

text.ascii: zivam ity eva yaM prAhur IzaM rudraM pinAkinam
text.ur: śivam ity eva yaṁ prāhur īśaṁ rudraṁ pinākinam

text.ascii: bhAvais tu vividhAkAraiH pUjayanti mahezvaram
text.ur: bhāvais tu vividhākāraiḥ pūjayanti maheśvaram

text.ascii: devasenApatis tv evaM devasenAbhir AvRtaH
text.ur: devasenāpatis tv evaṁ devasenābhir āvr̥taḥ

text.ascii: anugacchati devezaM brahmaNyaH kRttikAsutaH
text.ur: anugacchati deveśaṁ brahmaṇyaḥ kr̥ttikāsutaḥ

text.ascii: athAbravIn mahAsenaM mahAdevo bRhadvacaH
text.ur: athābravīn mahāsenaṁ mahādevo br̥hadvacaḥ

text.ascii: saptamaM mArutaskandhaM rakSa nityam atandritaH
text.ur: saptamaṁ mārutaskandhaṁ rakṣa nityam atandritaḥ

text.ascii: skanda uvAca
text.ur: skanda uvāca

text.ascii: saptamaM mArutaskandhaM pAlayiSyAmy ahaM prabho
text.ur: saptamaṁ mārutaskandhaṁ pālayiṣyāmy ahaṁ prabho

text.ascii: yad anyad api me kAryaM deva tad vada mAciram
text.ud: यदन्यदपि मे कार्यं देव तद्वद माचिरम्
text.ur: yad anyad api me kāryaṁ deva tad vada māciram

text.ascii: rudra uvAca
text.ur: rudra uvāca

text.ascii: kAryeSv ahaM tvayA putra saMdraSTavyaH sadaiva hi
text.ud: कार्येष्वहं त्वया पुत्र संद्रष्टव्यः सदैव हि
text.ur: kāryeṣv ahaṁ tvayā putra saṁdraṣṭavyaḥ sadaiva hi

text.ascii: darzanAn mama bhaktyA ca zreyaH param avApsyasi
text.ur: darśanān mama bhaktyā ca śreyaḥ param avāpsyasi

text.ascii: mArkaNDeya uvAca
text.ur: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca

text.ascii: ity uktvA visasarjainaM pariSvajya maheSvaraH
text.ur: ity uktvā visasarjainaṁ pariṣvajya maheṣvaraḥ

text.ascii: visarjite tataH skande babhUvautpAtikaM mahat
text.ur: visarjite tataḥ skande babhūvautpātikaṁ mahat

text.ascii: sahasaiva mahArAja devAn sarvAn pramohayat
text.ur: sahasaiva mahārāja devān sarvān pramohayat

text.ascii: jajvAla khaM sanakSatraM pramUDhaM bhuvanaM bhRzam
text.ud: जज्वाल खं सनक्षत्रं प्रमूढं भुवनं भृशम्
text.ur: jajvāla khaṁ sanakṣatraṁ pramūḍhaṁ bhuvanaṁ bhr̥śam

text.ascii: cacAla vyanadac corvI tamobhUtaM jagat prabho
text.ur: cacāla vyanadac corvī tamobhūtaṁ jagat prabho

text.ascii: tatas tad dAruNaM dRSTvA kSubhitaH zaMkaras tadA
text.ur: tatas tad dāruṇaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā kṣubhitaḥ śaṁkaras tadā

text.ascii: umA caiva mahAbhAgA devAz ca samaharSayaH
text.ur: umā caiva mahābhāgā devāś ca samaharṣayaḥ

text.ascii: tatas teSu pramUDheSu parvatAmbudasaMnibham
text.ur: tatas teṣu pramūḍheṣu parvatāmbudasaṁnibham

text.ascii: nAnApraharaNaM ghoram adRzyata mahad balam
text.ur: nānāpraharaṇaṁ ghoram adr̥śyata mahad balam

text.ascii: tad dhi ghoram asaMkhyeyaM garjac ca vividhA giraH
text.ur: tad dhi ghoram asaṁkhyeyaṁ garjac ca vividhā giraḥ

text.ascii: abhyadravad raNe devAn bhagavantaM ca zaMkaram
text.ur: abhyadravad raṇe devān bhagavantaṁ ca śaṁkaram

text.ascii: tair visRSTAny anIkeSu bANajAlAny anekazaH
text.ur: tair visr̥ṣṭāny anīkeṣu bāṇajālāny anekaśaḥ

text.ascii: parvatAz ca zataghnyaz ca prAsAz ca parighA gadAH
text.ur: parvatāś ca śataghnyaś ca prāsāś ca parighā gadāḥ

text.ascii: nipatadbhiz ca tair ghorair devAnIkaM mahAyudhaiH
text.ur: nipatadbhiś ca tair ghorair devānīkaṁ mahāyudhaiḥ

text.ascii: kSaNena vyadravat sarvaM vimukhaM cApy adRzyata
text.ur: kṣaṇena vyadravat sarvaṁ vimukhaṁ cāpy adr̥śyata

text.ascii: nikRttayodhanAgAzvaM kRttAyudhamahAratham
text.ur: nikr̥ttayodhanāgāśvaṁ kr̥ttāyudhamahāratham

text.ascii: dAnavair arditaM sainyaM devAnAM vimukhaM babhau
text.ur: dānavair arditaṁ sainyaṁ devānāṁ vimukhaṁ babhau

text.ascii: asurair vadhyamAnaM tat pAvakair iva kAnanam
text.ur: asurair vadhyamānaṁ tat pāvakair iva kānanam

text.ascii: apatad dagdhabhUyiSThaM mahAdrumavanaM yathA
text.ur: apatad dagdhabhūyiṣṭhaṁ mahādrumavanaṁ yathā

text.ascii: te vibhinnazirodehAH pracyavante divaukasaH
text.ur: te vibhinnaśirodehāḥ pracyavante divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: na nAtham adhyagacchanta vadhyamAnA mahAraNe
text.ur: na nātham adhyagacchanta vadhyamānā mahāraṇe

text.ascii: atha tad vidrutaM sainyaM dRSTvA devaH puraMdaraH
text.ud: अथ तद्विद्रुतं सैन्यं दृष्ट्वा देवः पुरंदरः
text.ur: atha tad vidrutaṁ sainyaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā devaḥ puraṁdaraḥ

text.ascii: AzvAsayann uvAcedaM balavad dAnavArditam
text.ur: āśvāsayann uvācedaṁ balavad dānavārditam

text.ascii: bhayaM tyajata bhadraM vaH zUrAH zastrANi gRhNata
text.ud: भयं त्यजत भद्रं वः शूराः शस्त्राणि गृह्णत
text.ur: bhayaṁ tyajata bhadraṁ vaḥ śūrāḥ śastrāṇi gr̥hṇata

text.ascii: kurudhvaM vikrame buddhiM mA vaH kA cid vyathA bhavet
text.ud: कुरुध्वं विक्रमे बुद्धिं मा वः काचिद्व्यथा भवेत्
text.ur: kurudhvaṁ vikrame buddhiṁ mā vaḥ kā cid vyathā bhavet

text.ascii: jayatainAn sudurvRttAn dAnavAn ghoradarzanAn
text.ur: jayatainān sudurvr̥ttān dānavān ghoradarśanān

text.ascii: abhidravata bhadraM vo mayA saha mahAsurAn
text.ud: अभिद्रवत भद्रं वो मया सह महासुरान्
text.ur: abhidravata bhadraṁ vo mayā saha mahāsurān

text.ascii: zakrasya vacanaM zrutvA samAzvastA divaukasaH
text.ur: śakrasya vacanaṁ śrutvā samāśvastā divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: dAnavAn pratyayudhyanta zakraM kRtvA vyapAzrayam
text.ur: dānavān pratyayudhyanta śakraṁ kr̥tvā vyapāśrayam

text.ascii: tatas te tridazAH sarve marutaz ca mahAbalAH
text.ur: tatas te tridaśāḥ sarve marutaś ca mahābalāḥ

text.ascii: pratyudyayur mahAvegAH sAdhyAz ca vasubhiH saha
text.ur: pratyudyayur mahāvegāḥ sādhyāś ca vasubhiḥ saha

text.ascii: tair visRSTAny anIkeSu kruddhaiH zastrANi saMyuge
text.ur: tair visr̥ṣṭāny anīkeṣu kruddhaiḥ śastrāṇi saṁyuge

text.ascii: zarAz ca daityakAyeSu pibanti smAsRgulbaNam
text.ur: śarāś ca daityakāyeṣu pibanti smāsr̥gulbaṇam

text.ascii: teSAM dehAn vinirbhidya zarAs te nizitAs tadA
text.ur: teṣāṁ dehān vinirbhidya śarās te niśitās tadā

text.ascii: niSpatanto adRzyanta nagebhya iva pannagAH
text.ur: niṣpatanto adr̥śyanta nagebhya iva pannagāḥ

text.ascii: tAni daityazarIrANi nirbhinnAni sma sAyakaiH
text.ur: tāni daityaśarīrāṇi nirbhinnāni sma sāyakaiḥ

text.ascii: apatan bhUtale rAjaMz chinnAbhrANIva sarvazaH
text.ur: apatan bhūtale rājaṁś chinnābhrāṇīva sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: tatas tad dAnavaM sainyaM sarvair devagaNair yudhi
text.ur: tatas tad dānavaṁ sainyaṁ sarvair devagaṇair yudhi

text.ascii: trAsitaM vividhair bANaiH kRtaM caiva parAGmukham
text.ur: trāsitaṁ vividhair bāṇaiḥ kr̥taṁ caiva parāṅmukham

text.ascii: athotkruSTaM tadA hRSTaiH sarvair devair udAyudhaiH
text.ur: athotkruṣṭaṁ tadā hr̥ṣṭaiḥ sarvair devair udāyudhaiḥ

text.ascii: saMhatAni ca tUryANi tadA sarvANy anekazaH
text.ur: saṁhatāni ca tūryāṇi tadā sarvāṇy anekaśaḥ

text.ascii: evam anyonyasaMyuktaM yuddham AsIt sudAruNam
text.ur: evam anyonyasaṁyuktaṁ yuddham āsīt sudāruṇam

text.ascii: devAnAM dAnavAnAM ca mAMsazoNitakardamam
text.ur: devānāṁ dānavānāṁ ca māṁsaśoṇitakardamam

text.ascii: anayo devalokasya sahasaiva vyadRzyata
text.ur: anayo devalokasya sahasaiva vyadr̥śyata

text.ascii: tathA hi dAnavA ghorA vinighnanti divaukasaH
text.ud: तथा हि दानवा घोरा विनिघ्नन्ति दिवौकसः
text.ur: tathā hi dānavā ghorā vinighnanti divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: tatas tUryapraNAdAz ca bherINAM ca mahAsvanAH
text.ur: tatas tūryapraṇādāś ca bherīṇāṁ ca mahāsvanāḥ

text.ascii: babhUvur dAnavendrANAM siMhanAdAz ca dAruNAH
text.ur: babhūvur dānavendrāṇāṁ siṁhanādāś ca dāruṇāḥ

text.ascii: atha daityabalAd ghorAn niSpapAta mahAbalaH
text.ur: atha daityabalād ghorān niṣpapāta mahābalaḥ

text.ascii: dAnavo mahiSo nAma pragRhya vipulaM girim
text.ud: दानवो महिषो नाम प्रगृह्य विपुलं गिरिम्
text.ur: dānavo mahiṣo nāma pragr̥hya vipulaṁ girim

text.ascii: te taM ghanair ivAdityaM dRSTvA saMparivAritam
text.ur: te taṁ ghanair ivādityaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā saṁparivāritam

text.ascii: samudyatagiriM rAjan vyadravanta divaukasaH
text.ur: samudyatagiriṁ rājan vyadravanta divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: athAbhidrutya mahiSo devAMz cikSepa taM girim
text.ur: athābhidrutya mahiṣo devāṁś cikṣepa taṁ girim

text.ascii: patatA tena giriNA devasainyasya pArthiva
text.ur: patatā tena giriṇā devasainyasya pārthiva

text.ascii: bhImarUpeNa nihatam ayutaM prApatad bhuvi
text.ur: bhīmarūpeṇa nihatam ayutaṁ prāpatad bhuvi

text.ascii: atha tair dAnavaiH sArdhaM mahiSas trAsayan surAn
text.ur: atha tair dānavaiḥ sārdhaṁ mahiṣas trāsayan surān

text.ascii: abhyadravad raNe tUrNaM siMhaH kSudramRgAn iva
text.ur: abhyadravad raṇe tūrṇaṁ siṁhaḥ kṣudramr̥gān iva

text.ascii: tam ApatantaM mahiSaM dRSTvA sendrA divaukasaH
text.ur: tam āpatantaṁ mahiṣaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā sendrā divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: vyadravanta raNe bhItA vizIrNAyudhaketanAH
text.ur: vyadravanta raṇe bhītā viśīrṇāyudhaketanāḥ

text.ascii: tataH sa mahiSaH kruddhas tUrNaM rudrarathaM yayau
text.ud: ततः स महिषः क्रुद्धस्तूर्णं रुद्ररथं ययौ
text.ur: tataḥ sa mahiṣaḥ kruddhas tūrṇaṁ rudrarathaṁ yayau

text.ascii: abhidrutya ca jagrAha rudrasya rathakUbaram
text.ur: abhidrutya ca jagrāha rudrasya rathakūbaram

text.ascii: yadA rudrarathaM kruddho mahiSaH sahasA gataH
text.ud: यदा रुद्ररथं क्रुद्धो महिषः सहसा गतः
text.ur: yadā rudrarathaṁ kruddho mahiṣaḥ sahasā gataḥ

text.ascii: resatU rodasI gADhaM mumuhuz ca maharSayaH
text.ur: resatū rodasī gāḍhaṁ mumuhuś ca maharṣayaḥ

text.ascii: vyanadaMz ca mahAkAyA daityA jaladharopamAH
text.ur: vyanadaṁś ca mahākāyā daityā jaladharopamāḥ

text.ascii: AsIc ca nizcitaM teSAM jitam asmAbhir ity uta
text.ur: āsīc ca niścitaṁ teṣāṁ jitam asmābhir ity uta

text.ascii: tathAbhUte tu bhagavAn nAvadhIn mahiSaM raNe
text.ur: tathābhūte tu bhagavān nāvadhīn mahiṣaṁ raṇe

text.ascii: sasmAra ca tadA skandaM mRtyuM tasya durAtmanaH
text.ud: सस्मार च तदा स्कन्दं मृत्युं तस्य दुरात्मनः
text.ur: sasmāra ca tadā skandaṁ mr̥tyuṁ tasya durātmanaḥ

text.ascii: mahiSo 'pi rathaM dRSTvA raudraM rudrasya nAnadat
text.ud: महिषोऽपि रथं दृष्ट्वा रौद्रं रुद्रस्य नानदत्
text.ur: mahiṣo ’pi rathaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā raudraṁ rudrasya nānadat

text.ascii: devAn saMtrAsayaMz cApi daityAMz cApi praharSayan
text.ur: devān saṁtrāsayaṁś cāpi daityāṁś cāpi praharṣayan

text.ascii: tatas tasmin bhaye ghore devAnAM samupasthite
text.ur: tatas tasmin bhaye ghore devānāṁ samupasthite

text.ascii: AjagAma mahAsenaH krodhAt sUrya iva jvalan
text.ur: ājagāma mahāsenaḥ krodhāt sūrya iva jvalan

text.ascii: lohitAmbarasaMvIto lohitasragvibhUSaNaH
text.ur: lohitāmbarasaṁvīto lohitasragvibhūṣaṇaḥ

text.ascii: lohitAsyo mahAbAhur hiraNyakavacaH prabhuH
text.ur: lohitāsyo mahābāhur hiraṇyakavacaḥ prabhuḥ

text.ascii: ratham AdityasaMkAzam AsthitaH kanakaprabham
text.ur: ratham ādityasaṁkāśam āsthitaḥ kanakaprabham

text.ascii: taM dRSTvA daityasenA sA vyadravat sahasA raNe
text.ud: तं दृष्ट्वा दैत्यसेना सा व्यद्रवत्सहसा रणे
text.ur: taṁ dr̥ṣṭvā daityasenā sā vyadravat sahasā raṇe

text.ascii: sa cApi tAM prajvalitAM mahiSasya vidAriNIm
text.ud: स चापि तां प्रज्वलितां महिषस्य विदारिणीम्
text.ur: sa cāpi tāṁ prajvalitāṁ mahiṣasya vidāriṇīm

text.ascii: mumoca zaktiM rAjendra mahAseno mahAbalaH
text.ur: mumoca śaktiṁ rājendra mahāseno mahābalaḥ

text.ascii: sA muktAbhyahanac chaktir mahiSasya ziro mahat
text.ur: sā muktābhyahanac chaktir mahiṣasya śiro mahat

text.ascii: papAta bhinne zirasi mahiSas tyaktajIvitaH
text.ur: papāta bhinne śirasi mahiṣas tyaktajīvitaḥ

text.ascii: kSiptAkSiptA tu sA zaktir hatvA zatrUn sahasrazaH
text.ur: kṣiptākṣiptā tu sā śaktir hatvā śatrūn sahasraśaḥ

text.ascii: skandahastam anuprAptA dRzyate devadAnavaiH
text.ur: skandahastam anuprāptā dr̥śyate devadānavaiḥ

text.ascii: prAyaH zarair vinihatA mahAsenena dhImatA
text.ur: prāyaḥ śarair vinihatā mahāsenena dhīmatā

text.ascii: zeSA daityagaNA ghorA bhItAs trastA durAsadaiH
text.ur: śeṣā daityagaṇā ghorā bhītās trastā durāsadaiḥ

text.ascii: skandasya pArSadair hatvA bhakSitAH zatasaMghazaH
text.ur: skandasya pārṣadair hatvā bhakṣitāḥ śatasaṁghaśaḥ

text.ascii: dAnavAn bhakSayantas te prapibantaz ca zoNitam
text.ur: dānavān bhakṣayantas te prapibantaś ca śoṇitam

text.ascii: kSaNAn nirdAnavaM sarvam akArSur bhRzaharSitAH
text.ur: kṣaṇān nirdānavaṁ sarvam akārṣur bhr̥śaharṣitāḥ

text.ascii: tamAMsIva yathA sUryo vRkSAn agnir ghanAn khagaH
text.ur: tamāṁsīva yathā sūryo vr̥kṣān agnir ghanān khagaḥ

text.ascii: tathA skando 'jayac chatrUn svena vIryeNa kIrtimAn
text.ur: tathā skando ’jayac chatrūn svena vīryeṇa kīrtimān

text.ascii: saMpUjyamAnas tridazair abhivAdya mahezvaram
text.ur: saṁpūjyamānas tridaśair abhivādya maheśvaram

text.ascii: zuzubhe kRttikAputraH prakIrNAMzur ivAMzumAn
text.ur: śuśubhe kr̥ttikāputraḥ prakīrṇāṁśur ivāṁśumān

text.ascii: naSTazatrur yadA skandaH prayAtaz ca mahezvaram
text.ur: naṣṭaśatrur yadā skandaḥ prayātaś ca maheśvaram

text.ascii: athAbravIn mahAsenaM pariSvajya puraMdaraH
text.ur: athābravīn mahāsenaṁ pariṣvajya puraṁdaraḥ

text.ascii: brahmadattavaraH skanda tvayAyaM mahiSo hataH
text.ur: brahmadattavaraḥ skanda tvayāyaṁ mahiṣo hataḥ

text.ascii: devAs tRNamayA yasya babhUvur jayatAM vara
text.ur: devās tr̥ṇamayā yasya babhūvur jayatāṁ vara

text.ascii: so 'yaM tvayA mahAbAho zamito devakaNTakaH
text.ur: so ’yaṁ tvayā mahābāho śamito devakaṇṭakaḥ

text.ascii: zataM mahiSatulyAnAM dAnavAnAM tvayA raNe
text.ur: śataṁ mahiṣatulyānāṁ dānavānāṁ tvayā raṇe

text.ascii: nihataM devazatrUNAM yair vayaM pUrvatApitAH
text.ur: nihataṁ devaśatrūṇāṁ yair vayaṁ pūrvatāpitāḥ

text.ascii: tAvakair bhakSitAz cAnye dAnavAH zatasaMghazaH
text.ur: tāvakair bhakṣitāś cānye dānavāḥ śatasaṁghaśaḥ

text.ascii: ajeyas tvaM raNe 'rINAm umApatir iva prabhuH
text.ur: ajeyas tvaṁ raṇe ’rīṇām umāpatir iva prabhuḥ

text.ascii: etat te prathamaM deva khyAtaM karma bhaviSyati
text.ud: एतत्ते प्रथमं देव ख्यातं कर्म भविष्यति
text.ur: etat te prathamaṁ deva khyātaṁ karma bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: triSu lokeSu kIrtiz ca tavAkSayyA bhaviSyati
text.ur: triṣu lokeṣu kīrtiś ca tavākṣayyā bhaviṣyati

text.ascii: vazagAz ca bhaviSyanti surAs tava surAtmaja
text.ur: vaśagāś ca bhaviṣyanti surās tava surātmaja

text.ascii: mahAsenety evam uktvA nivRttaH saha daivataiH
text.ur: mahāsenety evam uktvā nivr̥ttaḥ saha daivataiḥ

text.ascii: anujJAto bhagavatA tryambakena zacIpatiH
text.ur: anujñāto bhagavatā tryambakena śacīpatiḥ

text.ascii: gato bhadravaTaM rudro nivRttAz ca divaukasaH
text.ur: gato bhadravaṭaṁ rudro nivr̥ttāś ca divaukasaḥ

text.ascii: uktAz ca devA rudreNa skandaM pazyata mAm iva
text.ud: उक्ताश्च देवा रुद्रेण स्कन्दं पश्यत मामिव
text.ur: uktāś ca devā rudreṇa skandaṁ paśyata mām iva

text.ascii: sa hatvA dAnavagaNAn pUjyamAno maharSibhiH
text.ur: sa hatvā dānavagaṇān pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ

text.ascii: ekAhnaivAjayat sarvaM trailokyaM vahninandanaH
text.ur: ekāhnaivājayat sarvaṁ trailokyaṁ vahninandanaḥ

text.ascii: skandasya ya idaM janma paThate susamAhitaH
text.ud: स्कन्दस्य य इदं जन्म पठते सुसमाहितः
text.ur: skandasya ya idaṁ janma paṭhate susamāhitaḥ

text.ascii: sa puSTim iha saMprApya skandasAlokyatAm iyAt
text.ur: sa puṣṭim iha saṁprāpya skandasālokyatām iyāt
